---
title: "spotify all songs"
format: html
description: |
  Analysis of all Spotify songs data from TidyTuesday
author: charlotte friedman
date: February 12, 2025
---

```{r, echo=FALSE}

library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)

spotify_songs <- read_csv("spotify_songs.csv")

spotify_songs <- spotify_songs |>
  mutate(year = as.integer(substr(track_album_release_date, 1, 4)))

spotify_songs |> 
  group_by(year) |> 
  summarise(mean_duration = mean(duration_ms)/60000) |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = mean_duration)) +
  geom_line() +
  labs(y = "Duration (minutes)", title = "Average song duration over time")
  
```
